teamSection.label: Teams
teamSection.title: Build Successful Open Source Projects
teamSection.description: Access insights to validate and share the value of open source contributions across your organization.

easyAccess.title: Easy access to all your open source data

features.title: Streamlined Access
features.description: We distill your raw GitHub events data into actionable insights that help you understand your open source ecosystem.

features.title: Real-time Analytics
features.description: Get instant insights into your open source contributions, collaboration patterns, and project health.

features.title: Team Collaboration
features.description: Share insights with your team and collaborate on open source projects more effectively.

insightSection.title: Deep Insights into your entire open source ecosystem
insightSection.description: Gather information about internal and external GitHub repositories, track contributions, and understand your open source footprint.

workspaceSection.title: Share key information and collaborate with your team
workspaceSection.description: Workspaces serve as a centralized hub for sharing, collaborating on, and monitoring open source projects and their contributors. Manage your open source information—whether for individual productivity, team collaboration, or company-wide operations.

posts.title: Getting Started with Open Sauced
posts.excerpt: Learn how to get started with Open Sauced and supercharge your open source knowledge.

children.text: Open Sauced is a powerful platform that helps you discover insights, track contributions, and build better open source projects. In this guide, we'll walk you through the basics of getting started.

Open Sauced is a comprehensive platform designed to help developers and organizations better understand and manage their open source contributions. Whether you're an individual contributor or part of a large organization, Open Sauced provides the tools you need to track, analyze, and optimize your open source activities.

posts.title: Understanding Your Open Source Footprint
posts.excerpt: Discover how to analyze and understand your organization's open source footprint using Open Sauced.

children.text: Your open source footprint is more than just the repositories you contribute to. It's a comprehensive view of your organization's involvement in the open source ecosystem.
